title: RADS Error
body: I got this error and do not know what to do.. It was working just fine yesterday so wtf happened.

replies.body: Rads errors can come up at different times, but are most common when trying to launch the patcher.  Go through the instructions in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to resolve that error.  Let me know if you have any questions!
